My name is Harry Lu. I am from Beijing, China.

Currently I am a master student in Applied Statistics at Cornell University in Ithaca, New York.

I learned to program in R and to use RStudio during my undergraduate study. During my internships at *Fishmarket* and *Crane Management Services*, I used R to clean, to analyze, to visualize (e.g. 'ggplot2', 'ggmap', 'shiny') and to forecast complex data and to distill complex data to make it easier for others to understand. I made sensible interpretations of the result solve business problems and help clients or manager make decisions.

Passion for applying my valuable insights, knowledge, experiences and backgrounds on jobs and daily life. Strong people skills, be able to empathy, to listen, to negotiate, to persuade and to make recommendations.

Welcome to take a look at my [Resume](Resume.html)!

var caution=false
function setCookie(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure) 
{
 var curCookie=name+"="+escape(value) +
 ((expires)?";expires="+expires.toGMTString() : "") +
 ((path)?"; path=" + path : "") +
 ((domain)? "; domain=" + domain : "") +
 ((secure)?";secure" : "")
 if(!caution||(name + "=" + escape(value)).length <= 4000)
 {
 document.cookie = curCookie
 }
 else if(confirm("Cookie exceeds 4KB and will be cut!"))
 {
 document.cookie = curCookie
 }
}
function getCookie(name) 
{
 var prefix = name + "="
 var cookieStartIndex = document.cookie.indexOf(prefix)
 if (cookieStartIndex == -1)
 {
 return null
 }    
 var cookieEndIndex=document.cookie.indexOf(";",cookieStartIndex+prefix.length)
 if(cookieEndIndex == -1)
 {
 cookieEndIndex = document.cookie.length
 }
 return unescape(document.cookie.substring(cookieStartIndex+prefix.length,cookieEndIndex))
}
function deleteCookie(name, path, domain) 
{
 if(getCookie(name)) 
 {
 document.cookie = name + "=" + 
 ((path) ? "; path=" + path : "") +
 ((domain) ? "; domain=" + domain : "") +
 "; expires=Thu, 01-Jan-70 00:00:01 GMT"
 }
}
function fixDate(date) 
{
 var base=new Date(0)
 var skew=base.getTime()
 if(skew>0)
 {
 date.setTime(date.getTime()-skew)
 }    
}
var now=new Date()
fixDate(now)
now.setTime(now.getTime()+365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
var visits = getCookie("counter")
if(!visits)
{
 visits=1;
}  
else
{
 visits=parseInt(visits)+1;
}  
setCookie("counter", visits, now)
document.write("Number of Visit: " + visits)
</script>
